price: Então, nesse dia, não será interrogado, acerca de seu delito, nem humano nem jinn.
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
